channel.title: Bash on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on mattischrome

item.title: Testing a shell script
item.description:
This is a post that I have quickly written after writing a shell script to create new blog posts. I think that it might not be that safe and that I have to write in some more safegaurds to make it better. Also I have to work out how to enable soft wrap on neovim.

… some time later …

I managed to install a Vim plugin all by myself (not that hard really!) and now I can enable soft wrapping in Neovim with [ow (in normal mode of course).
